name: M.J. Leyolds
message: I have been a faithful smoker of your Sorgl Full Flavor brand for a number of years. I started saving my quality seals in one of your promotions recently in which for a free carton of Dorgls and I saved 190 seals. Went extra just to make sure mailed these over 12 months ago and have not received these items. I would appreciate some attention in this matter. Please. I await your reply. Thank you.
